alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Sanpete Valley; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:18PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Sanpete...Millard...northwestern Piute...Juab...western Sevier... Beaver...southwestern Utah...southern Tooele and northern Iron Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 416 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 21 miles northeast of Delta to 26 miles southwest of Milford. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. Some gusts may be severe. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong crosswinds could make travel difficult for high profile vehicles. Locations impacted include... Nephi, Delta, Beaver, Fillmore, Milford, Scipio, Santaquin, Rocky Ridge, Kanosh, Meadow, Partoun, Elberta, Cove Fort, Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge, Garrison, Spring Lake, Mona, Genola, Goshen and Minersville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 91 and 245. Interstate 70 between mile markers 0 and 20. US Route 6 between mile markers 0 and 160. US Route 50 between mile markers 90 and 146. Utah Route 21 between mile markers 0 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
